a.style: font-family:"Playfair Display", Georgia, "Times New Roman", serif

text.tspan: Total confirmed COVID-19 cases per million vs. Doubling time of total
The number of confirmed cases is lower than the number of total cases. The main reason for this is limited testing.
Doubling time of total confirmed cases
Total confirmed COVID-19 cases per million
Source: Johns Hopkins University CSSE COVID-19 Data – Last updated 14 December, 21:05 (London time)
